creator: warren.lewis@sas.com
text:
see  http://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=13983. This bug still
exists at Tomcat 5.5.X.

Mark Thomas asked that we open a bug at Tomcat 5.5 if this problem still exists,
it does.

Since 5.5.x requires at least a 1.4 JVM, the patch from 13983 has been re-
applied.  This will appear in 5.5.18, but could also benifit from testing from 
an SVN co build.
creator: william.barker@wilshire.com
warren.lewis@sas.com
text:
I tested SVN in the scenario where we were having this issue and it now
works as expected. Thanks for pushing this fix to Tomcat 5.5.X!
cheers - Warren
